casebody.data:
MARC BRYANT et al. v. FARMERS & MERCHANTS STATE BANK OF DENTON. [No. 10,

January Term, 1928.]

Decided February 15th, 1928.

The cause was submitted on briefs to Bond, O. J., Patti-son, Ukneb, Adkins, Offutt, Digges, Pabke, and Sloan, JJ.

Fred R. Owens and Howard Bryant, for the appellants. W. Brewster Deen and William J. Rickards, for the appellee.

A

per curiam

opinion was delivered.
